info.name: Hospital Management System
info.description:
The Hospital Management System API is a robust and flexible software interface designed to enhance the operational efficiency of healthcare institutions. It empowers hospitals, clinics, and medical facilities by providing seamless integration with a wide range of functions and features. Key components of this API include patient management, appointment scheduling, medical records digitization, and report generation. By streamlining administrative tasks and centralizing patient data, the Hospital Management System API not only simplifies the day-to-day operations of healthcare providers but also improves the overall quality of patient care. It represents a significant step toward modernizing healthcare delivery and ensuring that healthcare professionals can focus on what truly matters: the well-being of their patients.

**Technologies Used:**

In the development of our advanced system, we harnessed the capabilities of a carefully curated technology stack, including:

ðŸ‘‰ Java: version 17 - The heart of our project, Java 17 provided the foundation for our application's logic and functionality.

ðŸ‘‰ Spring Boot: version 3.1.1 - Spring Boot served as the framework that streamlined our development process, allowing us to create robust and efficient applications with ease.

ðŸ‘‰ Spring Security and JWT Security - Security is paramount, and Spring Security combined with JWT (JSON Web Tokens) ensured airtight user authentication and authorization based on different roles and permission.

ðŸ‘‰ MySQL - For data storage and management, MySQL was our trusted relational database management system.

ðŸ‘‰ Swagger UI and Postman - We adopted Swagger UI for clear and interactive API documentation, while Postman played a crucial role in thorough API testing and validation.

This carefully selected technology stack empowered us to create a high-performing and secure system that meets the demands of modern healthcare management.

item.name: staff

request.description: This endpoint allows you to authenticate each staff using JWT security by providing the staff's email and password.
This endpoint allows you to add a new staff to the Hospital Management System Database. You will be prompted to provide necessary information about the staff before adding them to the database.

request.description: This endpoint allows you to add multiple contact addresses for staff by providing the staff's unique ID and the contact address information.
This endpoint returns the list of all staff present in the Hospital Management System. This list can only be accessed by an authorized staff, the ADMIN.

ðŸ‘‰ Manage patients information

item.description: This folder contains all endpoint that allows you to carry out various activities on a patient

request.description: This endpoint allows a patient to make a request to see a doctor. The patient will be sent a confirmation email on submit of the request.

response.name: Empty field response

request.description: This endpoint returns the list of all requests
This endpoint returns the detail about a request by providing the request Id
This endpoint returns the details of a request by providing the status of the request. Possible status includes pending, fixed etc.
This endpoint returns all request made by a patient by proving the patient's id
This endpoint allows you to delete a request by providing the request Id
This endpoint allows you to delete all request made by a patient by providing the patient's Id

ðŸ’¼ Appointment Module:

This module provides you with different endpoints that allow you to do the following:

ðŸ‘‰ Schedule an appointment between a patient and a doctor

ðŸ‘‰ Reschedule an appointment

ðŸ‘‰ Update appointment status when they expire

ðŸ‘‰ Manage scheduled appointment

ðŸ‘‰ Cancel or update an appointment

ðŸ“¢ Notification Service:

This endpoint performs the following operations:

ðŸ‘‰ Send a confirmation mail to the patient/user when they request to see a doctor

ðŸ‘‰ Send a notification to both the patient and doctor when an appointment is scheduled

ðŸ‘‰ Send a notification to both the patient and doctor when an appointment is rescheduled

ðŸ‘‰ Send a reminder notification to both the patient and doctor 24 hours before their scheduled appointments.

response.name: Empty field response
Staff is not free response

  "time": "10:50",
  "patientId": "2",

  "description": "Tesing the endpoint to create an appointment based on a patient's request to see a doctor"
}
